q: Success is not final, failure is not fatal: It is the courage to continue that counts.
The only way to do great work is to love what you do.
Believe you can and you're halfway there.
Wealth is the ability to fully experience life.
Don't watch the clock; do what it does. Keep going.
Success usually comes to those who are too busy to be looking for it.
The secret of getting ahead is getting started.
Money is only a tool. It will take you wherever you wish, but it will not replace you as the driver.
Your time is limited, don't waste it living someone else's life.
The harder you work for something, the greater you'll feel when you achieve it.
Opportunities don't happen. You create them.
A goal is a dream with a deadline.
Too many of us are not living our dreams because we are living our fears.
The successful warrior is the average man, with laser-like focus.
It's not about money. It's about the people you have, how you're led, and how much you get it.
Dream big and dare to fail.
I find that the harder I work, the more luck I seem to have.
Formal education will make you a living; self-education will make you a fortune.
What you get by achieving your goals is not as important as what you become by achieving your goals.
The only limit to our realization of tomorrow will be our doubts of today.
Success is walking from failure to failure with no loss of enthusiasm.
Rich people have small TVs and big libraries, and poor people have small libraries and big TVs.
You miss 100% of the shots you don't take.
The best revenge is massive success.
An investment in knowledge pays the best interest.
If you really look closely, most overnight successes took a long time.
Motivation is what gets you started. Habit is what keeps you going.
Money often costs too much.
The way to get started is to quit talking and begin doing.
Don't be afraid to give up the good to go for the great.
Success is not in what you have, but who you are.
Time is money.
I attribute my success to this: I never gave or took any excuse.
The real test is not whether you avoid this failure, because you won't. It's whether you let it harden or shame you into inaction, or whether you learn from it.
A successful man is one who can lay a firm foundation with the bricks others have thrown at him.
Wealth consists not in having great possessions, but in having few wants.
If you are not willing to risk the usual, you will have to settle for the ordinary.
The difference between ordinary and extraordinary is that little extra.
Happiness is not in the mere possession of money; it lies in the joy of achievement, in the thrill of creative effort.
Try not to become a man of success. Rather become a man of value.
All our dreams can come true if we have the courage to pursue them.
The stock market is filled with individuals who know the price of everything, but the value of nothing.
It does not matter how slowly you go as long as you do not stop.
Success seems to be connected with action. Successful people keep moving. They make mistakes, but they don't quit.
I'd rather be optimistic and a fool than pessimistic and right.
Don't let the fear of losing be greater than the excitement of winning.
The only place where success comes before work is in the dictionary.
Wealth is largely the result of habit.
Everything you've ever wanted is on the other side of fear.
To succeed in life, you need two things: ignorance and confidence.
The mind is everything. What you think you become.
You don't have to be great to start, but you have to start to be great.
The future belongs to those who believe in the beauty of their dreams.
Rule No.1: Never lose money. Rule No.2: Never forget rule No.1.
Act as if what you do makes a difference. It does.
If you want to achieve greatness stop asking for permission.
Things work out best for those who make the best of how things work out.
To live a creative life, we must lose our fear of being wrong.
If you're offered a seat on a rocket ship, don't ask which seat! Just get on.
The only person you are destined to become is the person you decide to be.
Go confidently in the direction of your dreams. Live the life you have imagined.
When everything seems to be going against you, remember that the airplane takes off against the wind, not with it.
It's not whether you get knocked down, it's whether you get up.
An unexamined life is not worth living.
Dreaming, after all, is a form of planning.
The best time to plant a tree was 20 years ago. The second best time is now.
The best way to predict the future is to create it.
Your most unhappy customers are your greatest source of learning.
Winning isn't everything, but wanting to win is.
I have learned over the years that when one's mind is made up, this diminishes fear.
It is never too late to be what you might have been.
A person who never made a mistake never tried anything new.
The person who says it cannot be done should not interrupt the person who is doing it.
Everything has beauty, but not everyone can see.
The only real mistake is the one from which we learn nothing.
People often say that motivation doesn't last. Well, neither does bathing – that's why we recommend it daily.
Life shrinks or expands in proportion to one's courage.
If you hear a voice within you say 'you cannot paint,' then by all means paint and that voice will be silenced.
There is only one way to avoid criticism: do nothing, say nothing, and be nothing.
Ask and it will be given to you; search, and you will find; knock and the door will be opened for you.
The question isn't who is going to let me; it's who is going to stop me.
When I let go of what I am, I become what I might be.
We must believe that we are gifted for something, and that this thing, at whatever cost, must be attained.
Few things can help an individual more than to place responsibility on him, and to let him know that you trust him.
Certain things catch your eye, but pursue only those that capture the heart.
When one door of happiness closes, another opens, but often we look so long at the closed door that we do not see the one that has been opened for us.
Everything you've ever wanted is on the other side of fear.
How wonderful it is that nobody need wait a single moment before starting to improve the world.
We can easily forgive a child who is afraid of the dark; the real tragedy of life is when men are afraid of the light.
Do what you can, where you are, with what you have.

When I was 5 years old, my mother always told me that happiness was the key to life. When I went to school, they asked me what I wanted to be when I grew up. I wrote down 'happy'. They told me I didn't understand the assignment, and I told them they didn't understand life.
Fall seven times and stand up eight.
When I stand before God at the end of my life, I would hope that I would not have a single bit of talent left and could say, I used everything you gave me.
A truly rich man is one whose children run into his arms when his hands are empty.
It is not what you do for your children, but what you have taught them to do for themselves, that will make them successful human beings.
If you want your children to turn out well, spend twice as much time with them, and half as much money.
Build your own dreams, or someone else will hire you to build theirs.
Remember that not getting what you want is sometimes a wonderful stroke of luck.
The battles that count aren't the ones for gold medals. The struggles within yourself–the invisible battles inside all of us–that's where it's at.
Education costs money. But then so does ignorance.
The mind is everything. What you think you become.
You don't have to be great to start, but you have to start to be great.
The future belongs to those who believe in the beauty of their dreams.
Rule No.1: Never lose money. Rule No.2: Never forget rule No.1.
Act as if what you do makes a difference. It does.
If you want to achieve greatness stop asking for permission.
Things work out best for those who make the best of how things work out.
To live a creative life, we must lose our fear of being wrong.
If you're offered a seat on a rocket ship, don't ask which seat! Just get on.
The only person you are destined to become is the person you decide to be.
Go confidently in the direction of your dreams. Live the life you have imagined.
When everything seems to be going against you, remember that the airplane takes off against the wind, not with it.
It's not whether you get knocked down, it's whether you get up.
An unexamined life is not worth living.
Dreaming, after all, is a form of planning.
The best time to plant a tree was 20 years ago. The second best time is now.
The best way to predict the future is to create it.
Your most unhappy customers are your greatest source of learning.
Winning isn't everything, but wanting to win is.
I have learned over the years that when one's mind is made up, this diminishes fear.
It is never too late to be what you might have been.
A person who never made a mistake never tried anything new.
The person who says it cannot be done should not interrupt the person who is doing it.
Everything has beauty, but not everyone can see.
The only real mistake is the one from which we learn nothing.
People often say that motivation doesn't last. Well, neither does bathing – that's why we recommend it daily.
Life shrinks or expands in proportion to one's courage.
If you hear a voice within you say 'you cannot paint,' then by all means paint and that voice will be silenced.
There is only one way to avoid criticism: do nothing, say nothing, and be nothing.
Ask and it will be given to you; search, and you will find; knock and the door will be opened for you.
The question isn't who is going to let me; it's who is going to stop me.
When I let go of what I am, I become what I might be.
We must believe that we are gifted for something, and that this thing, at whatever cost, must be attained.
Few things can help an individual more than to place responsibility on him, and to let him know that you trust him.
Certain things catch your eye, but pursue only those that capture the heart.
When one door of happiness closes, another opens, but often we look so long at the closed door that we do not see the one that has been opened for us.
Everything you've ever wanted is on the other side of fear.
How wonderful it is that nobody need wait a single moment before starting to improve the world.
We can easily forgive a child who is afraid of the dark; the real tragedy of life is when men are afraid of the light.
Do what you can, where you are, with what you have.

When I was 5 years old, my mother always told me that happiness was the key to life. When I went to school, they asked me what I wanted to be when I grew up. I wrote down 'happy'. They told me I didn't understand the assignment, and I told them they didn't understand life.
Fall seven times and stand up eight.
When I stand before God at the end of my life, I would hope that I would not have a single bit of talent left and could say, I used everything you gave me.
A truly rich man is one whose children run into his arms when his hands are empty.
It is not what you do for your children, but what you have taught them to do for themselves, that will make them successful human beings.
If you want your children to turn out well, spend twice as much time with them, and half as much money.
Build your own dreams, or someone else will hire you to build theirs.
Remember that not getting what you want is sometimes a wonderful stroke of luck.
The battles that count aren't the ones for gold medals. The struggles within yourself–the invisible battles inside all of us–that's where it's at.
Education costs money. But then so does ignorance.
The greatest glory in living lies not in never falling, but in rising every time we fall.
The way to get started is to quit talking and begin doing.
Your time is limited, so don't waste it living someone else's life.
If you set your goals ridiculously high and it's a failure, you will fail above everyone else's success.
Life is what happens when you're busy making other plans.
Spread love everywhere you go. Let no one ever come to you without leaving happier.
When you reach the end of your rope, tie a knot in it and hang on.
Always remember that you are absolutely unique. Just like everyone else.
Don't judge each day by the harvest you reap but by the seeds that you plant.
The future belongs to those who prepare for it today.
Tell me and I forget. Teach me and I remember. Involve me and I learn.
It is during our darkest moments that we must focus to see the light.
Whoever is happy will make others happy too.
Do not go where the path may lead, go instead where there is no path and leave a trail.
You will face many defeats in life, but never let yourself be defeated.
The greatest wealth is to live content with little.
In the end, it's not the years in your life that count. It's the life in your years.
Never let the fear of striking out keep you from playing the game.
Life is either a daring adventure or nothing at all.
Many of life's failures are people who did not realize how close they were to success when they gave up.
You have brains in your head. You have feet in your shoes. You can steer yourself any direction you choose.
The only impossible journey is the one you never begin.
Only a life lived for others is a life worthwhile.
If life were predictable it would cease to be life, and be without flavor.
If you look at what you have in life, you'll always have more. If you look at what you don't have in life, you'll never have enough.
If you spend your life trying to be good at everything, you will never be great at anything.
Life is really simple, but we insist on making it complicated.
Life is a succession of lessons which must be lived to be understood.
You get in life what you have the courage to ask for.
Life is a long lesson in humility.
The biggest adventure you can take is to live the life of your dreams.
The purpose of our lives is to be happy.
Get busy living or get busy dying.
You only live once, but if you do it right, once is enough.
Money can't buy happiness, but it can make you awfully comfortable while you're being miserable.
Not how long, but how well you have lived is the main thing.
If you love life, don't waste time, for time is what life is made up of.
Life is made of ever so many partings welded together.
The longer I live, the more beautiful life becomes.
Keep smiling, because life is a beautiful thing and there's so much to smile about.
Health is the greatest gift, contentment the greatest wealth, faithfulness the best relationship.
You have within you right now, everything you need to deal with whatever the world can throw at you.
Believe you can and you're halfway there.
Although no one can go back and make a brand new start, anyone can start from now and make a brand new ending.
When I hear somebody sigh, 'Life is hard,' I am always tempted to ask, 'Compared to what?'
Don't cry because it's over, smile because it happened.
A successful man is one who makes more money than his wife can spend. A successful woman is one who can find such a man.
To succeed in life, you need three things: a wishbone, a backbone and a funny bone.
Life is short, and it is up to you to make it sweet.
The only way to do great work is to love what you do.
